title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, August 20, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1940 that Winston Churchill delivered a speech to the House of Commons with the famous line: "Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to so few."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
